nodes.bodyText: Does it has to be initialized with null?
No, but not initialized, i.e. IndexHtmlResponse indexHtmlResponse; is basically the same as IndexHtmlResponse indexHtmlResponse = null;? Or do you mean sth else?
Not really, there will be an LDC opcode to load variable with null value. Semantically, if null is not supposed to be there, it should be omitted, to reduce confusion during future refactoring
